2025 Toronto Blue Jays Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 41-36, 3rd place in AL_East (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 33.2% to make postseason, 0.4% to win World Series

Manager: John Schneider (41-36)

President: Mark Shapiro (President & CEO)

General Manager: Ross Atkins (Executive VP, Baseball Ops & GM)

Farm Director: Joe Sclafani

Scouting Director: Marc Tramuta

Ballpark: Rogers Centre

Attendance: 1,220,632 (4th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 104, Pitching - 104
    One-year: Batting - 112, Pitching - 113

Pythagorean W-L: 37-40, 330 Runs, 340 Runs Allowed
